post.summary: CreateRule creates alerting rule from the given template.

params.description: Rule parameters. All template parameters should be set.

items.description: ParamValue represents a single rule parameter value.

name.description: Machine-readable name (ID) that is used in expression.

severity.description: Severity represents severity level of the check result or alert.

custom_labels.description: All custom labels to add or remove (with empty values) to default labels from template.

parameters.description: Maximum number of results per page.

parameters.description: Index of the requested page, starts from 0.
parameters.name: page_index

parameters.description: If true, template files will be re-read from disk.
parameters.name: reload

items.description: Template represents Alert Template that is used to create Alert Rule.

expr.description: PromQL query expression with templating parameters.

items.description: ParamDefinition represents a single query parameter.

name.description: Machine-readable name (ID) that is used in expression.

unit.description:
ParamUnit represents template parameter unit.

 - PARAM_UNIT_UNSPECIFIED: Invalid, unknown or absent.
 - PARAM_UNIT_PERCENTAGE: %
 - PARAM_UNIT_SECONDS: s

bool.description: BoolParamDefinition represents boolean parameter's default value.

float.description: FloatParamDefinition represents float parameter's default value and valid range.

string.description: StringParamDefinition represents string parameter's default value.

severity.description: Severity represents severity level of the check result or alert.

source.description:
TemplateSource defines template source.

 - TEMPLATE_SOURCE_BUILT_IN: Template that is shipped with PMM Server releases.
 - TEMPLATE_SOURCE_SAAS: Template that is downloaded from check.percona.com.
 - TEMPLATE_SOURCE_USER_FILE: Templated loaded from user-suplied file.
 - TEMPLATE_SOURCE_USER_API: Templated created via API.

created_at.description: Template creation time. Empty for built-in and SaaS templates.

yaml.description: YAML template file content. Empty for built-in and SaaS templates.

put.summary: UpdateTemplate updates existing template, previously created via API.

parameters.description: Machine-readable name (ID).
parameters.name: name

delete.summary: DeleteTemplate deletes existing, previously created via API.

post.description:
Could return the Error message in the details containing specific ErrorCode indicating failure reason:
ERROR_CODE_XTRABACKUP_NOT_INSTALLED - xtrabackup is not installed on the service
ERROR_CODE_INVALID_XTRABACKUP - different versions of xtrabackup and xbcloud
ERROR_CODE_INCOMPATIBLE_XTRABACKUP - xtrabackup is not compatible with MySQL for taking a backup
ERROR_CODE_INCOMPATIBLE_TARGET_MYSQL - target MySQL version is not compatible with the artifact for performing a restore of the backup

connected.description: True if Agent is running and connected to pmm-managed.

items.description:
VMAgent runs on Generic or Container Node alongside pmm-agent.
It scrapes other exporter Agents that are configured with push_metrics_enabled
and uses Prometheus remote write protocol to push metrics to PMM Server.

pmm_agent_id.description: The pmm-agent identifier which runs this instance.

status.description:
AgentStatus represents actual Agent status.

 - AGENT_STATUS_STARTING: Agent is starting.
 - AGENT_STATUS_INITIALIZATION_ERROR: Agent encountered error when starting.
 - AGENT_STATUS_RUNNING: Agent is running.
 - AGENT_STATUS_WAITING: Agent encountered error and will be restarted automatically soon.
 - AGENT_STATUS_STOPPING: Agent is stopping.
 - AGENT_STATUS_DONE: Agent finished.
 - AGENT_STATUS_UNKNOWN: Agent is not connected, we don't know anything about it's state.

status.description:
AgentStatus represents actual Agent status.

 - AGENT_STATUS_STARTING: Agent is starting.
 - AGENT_STATUS_INITIALIZATION_ERROR: Agent encountered error when starting.
 - AGENT_STATUS_RUNNING: Agent is running.
 - AGENT_STATUS_WAITING: Agent encountered error and will be restarted automatically soon.
 - AGENT_STATUS_STOPPING: Agent is stopping.
 - AGENT_STATUS_DONE: Agent finished.
 - AGENT_STATUS_UNKNOWN: Agent is not connected, we don't know anything about it's state.

 - AGENT_STATUS_STARTING: Agent is starting.
 - AGENT_STATUS_INITIALIZATION_ERROR: Agent encountered error when starting.
 - AGENT_STATUS_RUNNING: Agent is running.
 - AGENT_STATUS_WAITING: Agent encountered error and will be restarted automatically soon.
 - AGENT_STATUS_STOPPING: Agent is stopping.
 - AGENT_STATUS_DONE: Agent finished.
 - AGENT_STATUS_UNKNOWN: Agent is not connected, we don't know anything about it's state.

lr.description: Low resolution. In JSON should be represented as a string with number of seconds with `s` suffix.

status.description:
AgentStatus represents actual Agent status.

 - AGENT_STATUS_STARTING: Agent is starting.
 - AGENT_STATUS_INITIALIZATION_ERROR: Agent encountered error when starting.
 - AGENT_STATUS_RUNNING: Agent is running.
 - AGENT_STATUS_WAITING: Agent encountered error and will be restarted automatically soon.
 - AGENT_STATUS_STOPPING: Agent is stopping.
 - AGENT_STATUS_DONE: Agent finished.
 - AGENT_STATUS_UNKNOWN: Agent is not connected, we don't know anything about it's state.

items.description: Row define metrics for selected dimention.

stats.description: Stat is statistics of specific metric.

items.description:
Point contains values that represents abscissa (time) and ordinate (volume etc.)
of every point in a coordinate system of Sparklines.

point.description: The serial number of the chart point from the largest time in the time interval to the lowest time in the time range.

timestamp.description: Time of point in format RFC3339.

m_query_time_sum_per_sec.description: The statement execution time in seconds.

m_lock_time_sum_per_sec.description: The time to acquire locks in seconds.

m_rows_sent_sum_per_sec.description: The number of rows sent to the client.

m_rows_affected_sum_per_sec.description: Number of rows changed - UPDATE, DELETE, INSERT.

m_rows_read_sum_per_sec.description: The number of rows read from tables.

m_merge_passes_sum_per_sec.description: The number of merge passes that the sort algorithm has had to do.

m_innodb_io_r_ops_sum_per_sec.description: Counts the number of page read operations scheduled.

m_innodb_io_r_bytes_sum_per_sec.description: Similar to innodb_IO_r_ops, but the unit is bytes.

m_innodb_io_r_wait_sum_per_sec.description: Shows how long (in seconds) it took InnoDB to actually read the data from storage.

m_innodb_rec_lock_wait_sum_per_sec.description: Shows how long (in seconds) the query waited for row locks.

m_innodb_queue_wait_sum_per_sec.description: Shows how long (in seconds) the query spent either waiting to enter the InnoDB queue or inside that queue waiting for execution.

m_innodb_pages_distinct_sum_per_sec.description: Counts approximately the number of unique pages the query accessed.

m_query_length_sum_per_sec.description: Shows how long the query is.

m_bytes_sent_sum_per_sec.description: The number of bytes sent to all clients.

m_tmp_tables_sum_per_sec.description: Number of temporary tables created on memory for the query.

m_tmp_disk_tables_sum_per_sec.description: Number of temporary tables created on disk for the query.

m_tmp_table_sizes_sum_per_sec.description: Total Size in bytes for all temporary tables used in the query.

m_full_scan_sum_per_sec.description: The query performed a full table scan.

m_full_join_sum_per_sec.description: The query performed a full join (a join without indexes).

m_tmp_table_sum_per_sec.description: The query created an implicit internal temporary table.

m_tmp_table_on_disk_sum_per_sec.description: The querys temporary table was stored on disk.

m_filesort_on_disk_sum_per_sec.description: The filesort was performed on disk.

m_select_full_range_join_sum_per_sec.description: The number of joins that used a range search on a reference table.

m_select_range_sum_per_sec.description: The number of joins that used ranges on the first table.

m_select_range_check_sum_per_sec.description: The number of joins without keys that check for key usage after each row.

m_sort_range_sum_per_sec.description: The number of sorts that were done using ranges.

m_sort_scan_sum_per_sec.description: The number of sorts that were done by scanning the table.

m_no_index_used_sum_per_sec.description: The number of queries without index.

m_no_good_index_used_sum_per_sec.description: The number of queries without good index.

m_response_length_sum_per_sec.description: The response length of the query result in bytes.

m_docs_examined_sum_per_sec.description: Total number of documents scanned during query execution.

m_keys_examined_sum_per_sec.description: Total number of index keys scanned during query execution.

m_locks_global_acquire_count_read_shared.description: Number of times a global read lock was acquired during query execution.

m_locks_global_acquire_count_write_share.description: Number of times a global write lock was acquired during query execution.

m_locks_database_acquire_count_read_shar.description: Number of times a read lock was acquired at the database level during query execution.

m_locks_database_acquire_wait_count_read.description: Number of times a read lock at the database level was requested but had to wait before being granted.

m_locks_database_time_acquiring_micros_r.description: Indicates the time, spent acquiring a read lock at the database level during an operation.

m_locks_collection_acquire_count_read_sh.description: Number of times a read lock was acquired on a specific collection during operations.

m_storage_bytes_read_sum_per_sec.description: Total number of bytes read from storage during a specific operation.

m_storage_time_reading_micros_sum_per_se.description: Indicates the time, spent reading data from storage during an operation.

m_shared_blks_hit_sum_per_sec.description: Total number of shared block cache hits by the statement.

m_shared_blks_read_sum_per_sec.description: Total number of shared blocks read by the statement.

m_shared_blks_dirtied_sum_per_sec.description: Total number of shared blocks dirtied by the statement.

m_shared_blks_written_sum_per_sec.description: Total number of shared blocks written by the statement.

m_shared_blk_read_time_sum_per_sec.description: Total time the statement spent reading shared blocks, in milliseconds (if track_io_timing is enabled, otherwise zero).

m_shared_blk_write_time_sum_per_sec.description: Total time the statement spent writing shared blocks, in milliseconds (if track_io_timing is enabled, otherwise zero).

m_local_blk_read_time_sum_per_sec.description: Total time the statement spent reading shared blocks, in milliseconds (if track_io_timing is enabled, otherwise zero).

m_local_blk_write_time_sum_per_sec.description: Total time the statement spent writing shared blocks, in milliseconds (if track_io_timing is enabled, otherwise zero).

m_local_blks_hit_sum_per_sec.description: Total number of local block cache hits by the statement.

m_local_blks_read_sum_per_sec.description: Total number of local blocks read by the statement.

m_local_blks_dirtied_sum_per_sec.description: Total number of local blocks dirtied by the statement.

m_local_blks_written_sum_per_sec.description: Total number of local blocks written by the statement.

m_temp_blks_read_sum_per_sec.description: Total number of temp blocks read by the statement.

m_temp_blks_written_sum_per_sec.description: Total number of temp blocks written by the statement.

m_blk_read_time_sum_per_sec.description: Total time the statement spent reading blocks, in milliseconds (if track_io_timing is enabled, otherwise zero).

m_query_time_sum_per_sec.description: The statement execution time in seconds.

m_lock_time_sum_per_sec.description: The time to acquire locks in seconds.

m_rows_sent_sum_per_sec.description: The number of rows sent to the client.

m_rows_affected_sum_per_sec.description: Number of rows changed - UPDATE, DELETE, INSERT.

m_rows_read_sum_per_sec.description: The number of rows read from tables.

m_merge_passes_sum_per_sec.description: The number of merge passes that the sort algorithm has had to do.

m_innodb_io_r_ops_sum_per_sec.description: Counts the number of page read operations scheduled.

m_innodb_io_r_bytes_sum_per_sec.description: Similar to innodb_IO_r_ops, but the unit is bytes.

m_innodb_io_r_wait_sum_per_sec.description: Shows how long (in seconds) it took InnoDB to actually read the data from storage.

m_innodb_rec_lock_wait_sum_per_sec.description: Shows how long (in seconds) the query waited for row locks.

m_innodb_queue_wait_sum_per_sec.description: Shows how long (in seconds) the query spent either waiting to enter the InnoDB queue or inside that queue waiting for execution.

m_innodb_pages_distinct_sum_per_sec.description: Counts approximately the number of unique pages the query accessed.

m_query_length_sum_per_sec.description: Shows how long the query is.

m_bytes_sent_sum_per_sec.description: The number of bytes sent to all clients.

m_tmp_tables_sum_per_sec.description: Number of temporary tables created on memory for the query.

m_tmp_disk_tables_sum_per_sec.description: Number of temporary tables created on disk for the query.

m_tmp_table_sizes_sum_per_sec.description: Total Size in bytes for all temporary tables used in the query.

m_full_scan_sum_per_sec.description: The query performed a full table scan.

m_full_join_sum_per_sec.description: The query performed a full join (a join without indexes).

m_tmp_table_sum_per_sec.description: The query created an implicit internal temporary table.

m_tmp_table_on_disk_sum_per_sec.description: The querys temporary table was stored on disk.

m_filesort_on_disk_sum_per_sec.description: The filesort was performed on disk.

m_select_full_range_join_sum_per_sec.description: The number of joins that used a range search on a reference table.

m_select_range_sum_per_sec.description: The number of joins that used ranges on the first table.

m_select_range_check_sum_per_sec.description: The number of joins without keys that check for key usage after each row.

m_sort_range_sum_per_sec.description: The number of sorts that were done using ranges.

m_sort_scan_sum_per_sec.description: The number of sorts that were done by scanning the table.

m_no_index_used_sum_per_sec.description: The number of queries without index.

m_no_good_index_used_sum_per_sec.description: The number of queries without good index.

m_response_length_sum_per_sec.description: The response length of the query result in bytes.

m_docs_examined_sum_per_sec.description: Total number of documents scanned during query execution.

m_keys_examined_sum_per_sec.description: Total number of index keys scanned during query execution.

m_locks_global_acquire_count_read_shared.description: Number of times a global read lock was acquired during query execution.

m_locks_global_acquire_count_write_share.description: Number of times a global write lock was acquired during query execution.

m_locks_database_acquire_count_read_shar.description: Number of times a read lock was acquired at the database level during query execution.

m_locks_database_acquire_wait_count_read.description: Number of times a read lock at the database level was requested but had to wait before being granted.

m_locks_database_time_acquiring_micros_r.description: Indicates the time, spent acquiring a read lock at the database level during an operation.

m_locks_collection_acquire_count_read_sh.description: Number of times a read lock was acquired on a specific collection during operations.

m_storage_bytes_read_sum_per_sec.description: Total number of bytes read from storage during a specific operation.

m_storage_time_reading_micros_sum_per_se.description: Indicates the time, spent reading data from storage during an operation.
